p: The median CD4 count was lower in the frame of HIV-infection (354 versus 414 cells/mm 3] in HIV-negative women. Median CD4 obtained in HIV-free population was surprising; however, this could be justified by the fact that these women attending the health facility (likely due to illed-health for some of them) [ 14, 15, 19]. Furthermore, it was previously reported that CD4 levels could vary with different conditions, including but not limited to stress, smoking, menstrual cycle, contraceptive pill, physical activity, etc. [ 20]
